#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long int power(long long int base,long long int exp)
{
    if(exp==0)
    return 1;

    long long int temp = power(base,exp/2);
    if(exp%2==0)
    return temp*temp;
    else return base*temp*temp;
}

int main()
{
    long long int n,i;
    cin>>n;
    for( i=n;;++i)
    {
        long long int c=0,a=i;
        while(a>0)
        {
            int r = a%10;
            c=c*10+r;
            a=a/10;
        }
        int flag=0;
        if(c==i)
        {
            flag=1;
            for(long long int j=2;j<=sqrt(i);++j)
            {
                if(i%j==0)
                {
                    flag=0;
                    break;
                }
            }

        }
        if(flag==1)
            break;
    }
    cout<<i<<"\n";
    return 0;
}
